description.name: Tag Manager & Enhanced Ecommerce v4.1.2
description.tagline: Quick and easy integrate Google Tag Manager and GA Enhanced Ecommerce.
description.long: Tag Manager & Enhanced Ecommerce provides a quick and easy way to integrate Google Tag Manager tracking and Analytics Enhanced Ecommerce into your WHMCS installation
features: Enable all Google Analytics Enhancement Ecommerce Reports
Insert dozen of tracking codes without any manual coding
Fully integration with Google Ads conversion tracking
